Class MP3Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • MP3Player

  • public class MP3Player
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Driver with a simple command language to control the audio playback.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Driver with a simple command language to control the audio playback.
        • + Play next playlist entry.
        • - Play previous playlist entry.
        • @ Replay current playlist entry.
        • h Print help message.
        • i [n] Print information on nth playlist entry. Default is current entry.
        • p [n] Play the nth play list entry. Default is the first entry.
        • P Pause playing.
        • R Resume playing.
        • s Print the size of the playlist.
        • t Print the time position in the currently playing entry.
        • q Quit (exit).
